item.title: 美联储梅斯特寻求通胀压力缓解的更多证据
item.description: 克利夫兰联邦储备银行行长洛雷塔-梅斯特（Loretta Mester）周四表示，将美国央行政策维持在当前水平将有助于使仍然高企的通胀率回到2%的目标。【原文：Federal Reserve Bank of Cleveland President Loretta Mester said on Thursday holding U.S. central bank policy at current levels will help get still-high inflation back to the 2% target.】

item.title: 拉塔姆航空公司扩大巴西国际航班的频率；法国航空公司增加航线
item.description: 拉塔姆航空公司（LATAM Airlines）周四表示，该公司将增加连接巴西与美国以及欧洲和非洲国家的七条国际航线的班次。【原文：LATAM Airlines will increase the frequency of seven of its international routes connecting Brazil to the United States and countries in Europe and Africa, it said on Thursday.】

item.title: 白宫布雷纳德称中国出口可能损害对美投资
item.description: 白宫国家经济顾问莱尔-布雷纳德（Lael Brainard）周四表示，中国的工业产能和某些行业的出口量如此之大，可能会削弱在美国投资的可行性。【原文：White House National Economic Adviser Lael Brainard said on Thursday China's industrial capacity and exports in certain sectors are so large, they can undermine the viability of investments in the United States.】

item.title: 国际货币基金组织美国应保持开放贸易，与中国合作解决争端
item.description: 国际货币基金组织（International Monetary Fund）周四表示，美国最好维持其开放的贸易体系，而不是对中国商品征收新的惩罚性关税。【原文：The U.S. would be better served by maintaining its open trade system rather than imposing new punitive duties on Chinese goods, the International Monetary Fund said on Thursday, adding that Washington and Beijing should work together to resolve their trade tensions.】

item.title: 迪士尼、福克斯、华纳兄弟发现名为 Venu Sports 的体育流媒体合资企业
item.description: 该公司首席执行官皮特-迪斯塔德（Pete Distad）周四表示，华特迪士尼公司、华纳兄弟发现公司和福克斯公司将推出的体育流媒体服务将被命名为 Venu Sports，并有望于今年秋季推出。【原文：The sports-streaming service set to be launched by Walt Disney Co , Warner Bros Discovery and Fox Corp will be called Venu Sports and is on track for launch this fall, Pete Distad, the venture's CEO, said on Thursday.】

item.title: 安培计算公司与高通公司合作研发人工智能，并发布新芯片
item.description: 安培计算公司（Ampere Computing）周四表示，该公司正在将其芯片与高通公司（Qualcomm）的芯片进行配对，推出一款新产品，旨在降低人工智能芯片运行所产生的电费。【原文：Ampere Computing on Thursday said it was pairing its chips with those from Qualcomm in a new offering aimed at lowering the power bills from operating artificial intelligence chips.】

item.title: VIEW 道指触及 40,000 点，因盈利增长和降息押注
item.description: 周四，道琼斯工业平均指数首次突破 40,000 点，这是蓝筹股指数最快的一次 10,000 点攀升，强劲的季度业绩和对美联储降息的押注不断升温为其提供了动力。【原文：The Dow Jones Industrial Average surpassed 40,000 points for the first time on Thursday, the blue-chip index's fastest 10,000 point-climb, powered by strong quarterly results and rising bets of interest rate cuts by the Federal Reserve.】

item.title: 受财报提振和降息押注影响，道指短暂冲破 40,000 点大关
item.description: 周四，道琼斯工业平均指数首次短暂突破 40,000 点水平，这是蓝筹股指数最快的一次 10,000 点攀升，强劲的季度业绩和对美联储降息的押注不断升温为其提供了动力。【原文：The Dow Jones Industrial Average briefly breached the 40,000-point level for the first time on Thursday, the blue-chip index's fastest 10,000-point climb, powered by strong quarterly results and rising bets of interest-rate cuts by the Federal Reserve.】

item.title: 高盛达成管理 UPS 养老基金 434 亿美元资产的协议
item.description: 高盛资产管理公司（Goldman Sachs Asset Management）被任命为包裹递送公司 UPS 旗下价值 434 亿美元北美养老基金资产的外包首席投资官。【原文：Goldman Sachs Asset Management has been appointed the outsourced chief investment officer for $43.4 billion North American pension fund assets belonging to parcel delivery firm UPS .】

item.title: 研究显示，今年计划购买电动汽车的美国人越来越少
item.description: J.D. Power的一项研究显示，由于经济型汽车短缺、充电基础设施不足以及对电动汽车好处的无知，考虑在2024年购买电动汽车的美国买家数量比一年前有所下降。【原文：The number of buyers in the U.S. considering an electric vehicle purchase in 2024 has fallen from a year ago due to a shortage of affordable cars, inadequate charging infrastructure and ignorance about EV benefits, a study by J.D. Power has shown.】

item.title: 美国最高法院支持消费者金融监督机构的筹资机制
item.description: 美国最高法院周四在发薪日贷款行业提出的质疑中维持了消费者金融保护局的拨款机制，这给乔-拜登总统的政府带来了胜利，也给该机构的保守派批评者带来了挫折。【原文：The U.S. Supreme Court on Thursday upheld the Consumer Financial Protection Bureau's funding mechanism in a challenge brought by the payday loan industry, handing a victory to President Joe Biden's administration and a setback to the agency's conservative critics.】

item.title: 尽管 "最后一英里 "的风险依然存在，但全球避免了工资价格螺旋式上升--研究
item.description: 两位顶级经济学家得出结论认为，发达经济体迄今尚未因大流行病后爆发的通胀而出现破坏性的工资价格螺旋上升，一些国家有可能从这一事件中相对无痛地着陆，但尚未得到保证。【原文：Developed economies have so far skirted a damaging wage price spiral from the breakout of inflation that followed the pandemic, two top economists have concluded, with a relatively painless landing from the episode possible in some countries but not yet assured.】

item.title: 美国 4 月制造业产出意外下降
item.description: 周四的数据显示，由于机动车产量下降，4月份美国工厂的产量意外下降。【原文：Production at U.S. factories unexpectedly fell in April amid a decline in motor vehicle output, data showed on Thursday.】

item.title: 独家新闻消息人士称，美国将倾向于让现有投资者获得委内瑞拉石油许可证
item.description: 两位接近讨论的人士说，美国正准备优先向已有石油生产和资产的公司发放有限的在委内瑞拉运营的许可证，而不是那些寻求首次进入这个受到欧佩克制裁的国家的公司。【原文：The U.S. is preparing to prioritize issuing limited licenses to operate in Venezuela to companies with existing oil production and assets over those seeking to enter the sanctioned OPEC nation for the first time, two people close to the discussions said.】

item.title: 阿迪达斯股东再次选举托马斯-拉贝为董事长
item.description: 周四，阿迪达斯大多数股东支持董事长托马斯-拉贝连任，他的任期将再延长一年，直至 2025 年，届时这家德国运动品牌将任命一位新董事长。【原文：A majority of Adidas shareholders backed the re-election of chairman Thomas Rabe on Thursday, securing his role for another year, until 2025 when the German sportswear brand will appoint a new chair.】

item.title: 美国联邦航空局允许美国联合航空公司重新启动认证活动
item.description: 美国联合航空公司（United Airlines）周四表示，美国联邦航空管理局已允许该公司重新启动认证活动，包括新飞机和新航线。【原文：United Airlines said on Thursday the U.S. Federal Aviation Administration has permitted the carrier to restart its certification activities, including new aircraft and routes.】

item.title: 美国 4 月独户住宅开工量和许可量下降
item.description: 在抵押贷款利率回升的影响下，美国 4 月份的独栋住宅建设和许可证数量均有所下降，但待售房屋的严重短缺仍为新建筑提供了支撑。【原文：U.S. single-family homebuilding and permits fell in April amid a resurgence in mortgage rates, but new construction remains supported by an acute shortage of houses for sale.】

item.title: 美国 4 月份进口价格创两年来最大涨幅
item.description: 由于能源产品和其他商品的成本上升，4 月份美国进口价格创下两年来的最大涨幅，这表明国内通胀可能在一段时间内持续走高。【原文：U.S. import prices rose by the most in two years in April amid rising costs for energy products and other goods, suggesting that domestic inflation could remain elevated for a while.】

item.title: 美国因维吾尔族强迫劳动禁止从 26 家棉花贸易商和仓库进口棉花
item.description: 美国政府周四在网上发布公告称，美国正在阻止从26家棉花贸易商或仓库设施进口棉花，美国称这些棉花贸易商或仓库设施与强迫维吾尔人劳动有关。【原文：The United States is blocking imports from 26 cotton traders or warehouse facilities that it says are linked to forced Uyghur labor, a U.S. government notice posted online on Thursday said.】

item.title: 雨果-博斯与大卫-贝克汉姆合作推出设计系列
item.description: 德国时尚品牌雨果-博斯（Hugo Boss）周四表示，该公司已与前曼联中场大卫-贝克汉姆（David Beckham）建立了多年的设计合作伙伴关系，以提高对其 Boss 品牌的需求。【原文：Hugo Boss has struck up a multi-year design partnership with Former Manchester United midfielder David Beckham, the German fashion house said on Thursday, as it seeks to boost demand for its Boss brand.】

item.title: 美国每周申请失业救济人数下降；劳动力市场逐步缓解
item.description: 上周新申请失业救济金的美国人数量有所下降，表明劳动力市场基本强劲。【原文：The number of Americans filing new claims for unemployment benefits fell last week, pointing to underlying strength in the labor market.】

item.title: 通胀数据疲软，主要券商维持美国降息观点
item.description: 在通胀数据低于预期提振了经济软着陆的希望之后，全球顶级券商维持了对美国联邦储备委员会今年降息时间的预期。【原文：Top global brokerages have retained their expectations for when the U.S. Federal Reserve will lower interest rates this year, after softer-than-expected inflation data boosted hopes of a soft landing for the economy.】

item.title: 网络设备需求回升，思科公司股价上涨
item.description: 周四收盘前，思科系统公司股价上涨约 4%，因为其乐观的第四季度预测表明，网络设备需求进一步趋稳，而且该公司以 280 亿美元收购网络安全公司 Splunk 的交易也带来了收益。【原文：Cisco Systems shares rose about 4% before the bell on Thursday after an upbeat fourth-quarter forecast signaled further stabilization in networking equipment demand and benefits from its $28 billion deal for cybersecurity firm Splunk.】

item.title: 强生公司将以 8.5 亿美元收购 Proteologix 公司
item.description: 强生公司（Johnson & Johnson）周四表示，将以 8.5 亿美元现金收购私人控股的 Proteologix 公司，并有可能获得额外的里程碑付款。【原文：Johnson & Johnson on Thursday said it would acquire privately held Proteologix for $850 million in cash, with potential for an additional milestone payment.】

item.title: Under Armour 预测全年销售额和利润均将下滑，股价暴跌
item.description: 服装生产商 Under Armour 周四预测其年度收入和利润低于分析师预期，这表明美国消费者在通胀压力下削减了可自由支配的开支，从而导致对其运动服装的需求疲软。【原文：Apparel maker Under Armour forecast its annual revenue and profit below analysts' expectations on Thursday, a sign of soft demand for its sportswear in the U.S. as consumers cut back on discretionary spending in the face of sticky inflation.】

item.title: 消息人士称，汉莎航空为达成 ITA 协议提供了短途航线折中方案
item.description: 直接了解此事的人士周四表示，汉莎航空已提出保留一些竞争性的 ITA 短途航线，以争取欧盟反垄断机构批准其竞购意大利航空公司的股份。【原文：Lufthansa has offered to keep some competing ITA short-haul routes in an effort to secure EU antitrust approval for its bid for a stake in the Italian airline, people with direct knowledge of the matter said on Thursday.】

item.title: 沃尔玛上调全年销售和利润预期，股价上涨
item.description: 美国零售业巨头沃尔玛周四上调了 2025 财年的销售和利润预期，预计通胀缓解将进一步刺激生活必需品的需求，并带来电子产品等可自由支配产品销售的反弹。【原文：U.S. retail giant Walmart raised its fiscal 2025 sales and profit forecast on Thursday, betting on easing inflation to further boost demand for essentials and bring a rebound in sales of discretionary products like electronics.】

item.title: GameStop 和 AMC 业绩滑坡，主题股涨势乏力
item.description: 零售业宠儿 GameStop 和 AMC 周四在盘前交易中继续下滑，因为作为 2021 年 meme 股涨势核心人物的 "咆哮的凯蒂猫 "回归的兴奋情绪逐渐消退。【原文：Retail darlings GameStop and AMC continued their slide into premarket trading on Thursday, as the euphoria over the return of "Roaring Kitty", who was the central figure in 2021 meme stock rally, fizzles out.】

item.title: 全球监管机构称银行业数字化带来新风险
item.description: 全球银行业监管机构周四在一份报告中称，数字化和大科技进入金融业会带来新的漏洞，并扩大银行系统中现有的风险，可能需要新的规则来缓解这些风险。【原文：The digitalisation and entry of Big Tech into finance create new vulnerabilities and amplify existing risks in the banking system that may need new rules to mitigate, global banking regulators said in a report on Thursday.】

item.title: 作物价格下跌挤压需求，迪尔下调 2024 年利润预期
item.description: 由于农作物价格下跌，农民购买拖拉机和联合收割机的数量减少，迪尔公司周四第二次下调了年度利润预期。【原文：Deere trimmed its annual profit forecast for the second time on Thursday, as farmers buy fewer tractors and combine harvesters due to falling crop prices.】
